mapper.select: select p.pid, p.bname, p.clarge, p.cmedium, p.csmall, p.pname, p.pprice, p.pdetail, c.ccolorcode, c.cimage1, c.cimage2, c.cimage3, c.cimage4, c.cimage5 from product p join color c on p.pid = c.pid where p.pid=#{pid}
select p.pid, pname, c.clarge, c.medium, c.csamll, pprice, c.cimage3, c.cimage4 from product p join color c on p.pid = c.pid where bname = #{bname}
select pid, bno, clarge, cmedium, csamll, pname, pprice, pdetail, c.cimage1, c.cimage2 from product p join color c on p.pid = c.pid where bname = #{bname}

select distinct ssize from stock where pid=#{pid} ORDER BY CASE ssize WHEN 'XXS' THEN 0 WHEN 'XS' THEN 1 WHEN 'S' THEN 2 WHEN 'M' THEN 3 WHEN 'L' THEN 4 WHEN 'XL' THEN 5 WHEN 'XXL' THEN 6 END ASC, to_number(REGEXP_REPLACE(ssize, '[^0-9]'))
